itemDisplayName: Deploy a SharePoint 2016 environment configured to use federated authentication with ADFS
description: This template deploys 3 new Azure VMs, each with its public IP address, one VM is a new AD domain with AD CS and AD FS configured, one is SQL Server and one is SharePoint 2016, configured with 1 web application and 2 zones, default zone is using Windows authentication and Intranet zone is using federated authentication
summary: Deploy a SharePoint 2016 environment configured to use federated authentication with ADFS
